testcase.classname: I want to perform a simple smoke test for leadgen in prod
testcase.name: As a user i want to test leadGen so that i can get thank you page after entering Email
testcase.system-out: And User navigate to LeadGen in Prod........................................passed When User enter Email.......................................................passed And User Click on Submit button.............................................passed Then User verify that thankyou page is displayed............................passed And User close the browser..................................................passed
